div.div: UPDATED INFORMATION REGARDING CLOSURE - PLEASE READ

h3.a: Yearbook 2020: Order your 8th grade shout out today! DUE APRIL 20, 2020

div.div: Due to the COVID 19 Crisis we will ONLY be accepting shout outs to individual 8th grade students or the 8th grade class as a whole. We are not accepting any further business advertisements (any previously ordered business advertisements will be honored). Please follow this link to order a shout out for one (or more!) of the awesome IDCS class of 2020 graduates.
Please check here often for updated information regarding COVID0-19.

IDCS is responding proactively to situations related to COVID 19. And, our goal is to keep IDCS open. If we had to close the school, there may be a possibility for our teachers/students to engage in online learning. Please click on this News Article to complete the survey.
Student Led Conferences, Book Fair, Kids Heart Challenge, and more!
